example.text: Make no mistake, Republican extremists are forcing us to choose between wrecking our economy or wrecking our families. Their default strategy will lead to: More children going to bed hungry More women dying in childbirth More veteran suicides [[url]]

The Speak Out Act comes on the heels of the fifth anniversary of the "Me Too" Movement, which brought to light countless stories of sexual misconduct in the workplace. I'm grateful to the bipartisan group of Congressional leaders, dedicated advocates, and President Biden for a new law that will create safer and more productive workplaces and civic society.

Make no mistake, Republican extremists are forcing us to choose between wrecking our economy or wrecking our families. Their default strategy will lead to: More children going to bed hungry More women dying in childbirth More veteran suicides [[url]]

#OTD in 1960, the FDA approved the first birth control pill—giving women more control over the personal decision of if & when to grow their family. 60+ years later, and we are still fighting extremist politicians that want to threaten that freedom once again. [[url]]

Palestinian Islamic Jihad in Gaza has fired hundreds of rockets at Israeli civilians. I condemn these acts of terror & am grateful that the Iron Dome is there to save lives. We must continue to support the Iron Dome & Israel's security. [[url]]
